Text: A Holiday Head Start from Barnes NoblecomBarnes Noblecom Customer We are excited to present you with a great reason to get your holiday shopping done early You can now save off any purchase of or more but hurry because this special offer expires on Friday November th To start saving now click here cgibinfloyDeDCrBMWHzjsCSm Weve also added two innovative new features to our site that will make shopping at Barnes Noblecom easier and more convenient than ever THE VISUAL SHOPPING CART This nifty feature allows you to see all the items in your Shopping Cart no matter where you go on our site As soon as you add an item to your Shopping Cart it immediately appears in a small window on the top left side of the page When you move to any other page the Visual Shopping Cart follows you so that you can keep track of all your purchases THE WISHLIST If youre like us you always see interesting things in stores or online but you want to find out more about them before you actually buy them Now you can simply add them to Barnes Noblecoms new Wishlist which keeps track of them for you for up to six months Just click on the link just below the Add to Cart button on the righthand side of any item page and you will immediately see your updated Wishlist with that item added along with your Shopping Cart information From there you can go directly to Checkout or continue shopping Try out these new services today using your coupon cgibinfloyDeDCrBMWHzjsCSm And dont forget to share the spirit of giving by forwarding this email to your friends Happy Shopping Your Friends at Barnes Noblecom PLEASE NOTE If you do not wish to receive future email updates please click here cgibinprofileyDeDCrBMWHzjse
